name: UFO Master Blaster
description:
How to play:
* The lowest 1/4 of the screen guides the missile left and right *
* The upper 3/4 of the screen acts as a launch button *
* Or alternatively, use an iCade compatible controller *

UFO Master Blaster (from the original manual): A simulation of an early handheld electronic game from the late 70's, re-capturing the sights, sounds and excitement of a lost era.

Fire your missiles and attack as many UFO's as you can in 80 seconds. UFO's will hover down in anticipation of an attack. Your score depends on the altitude of the UFO when destroyed.

Control the direction of the missiles and guide them from left to right and back again after leaving the launching pad.

UFO's change course, attack singularly and in pairs, and sometimes suddenly disappear. When a missile hits a UFO, an explosion occurs.
